drawer_spantext1: We are currently working with bus owners to continuously collect and update bus timings
drawer_spantext3: to report or update any incorrect bus information.
aboutus_spantext1: Zatri is your real-time bus travel companion.
aboutus_spantext2: Get precise real-time information of public Bus transit, plan your trips in a smarter & faster way. Our app gives you all the info you need, in a clear and easy way around the public buses route and stops and their schedule.
aboutus_spantext3: You can even track the realtime location of bus for a status.
